page.title: 10FARMING
page.content: We interviewed one of the farmers who live and work in Dagnall.He had lived in Dagnall for 60 years and had inherited the farm from his father.The farm covers about 88 acres of ground used mainly for growing cereal crops and potatoes.In the yard of the farm he keeps a few chickens for their eggs but no other livestock. He employs his son and a few local people to work for him although this changes with the seasons as there is more work to do in the summer when he normally works a 12 hour day.He is a man of habit and always gets up at 6.00 hours in the morning even in the winter.
